fields.name: West Yorkshire Spinners Signature 4ply Wool & Nylon Yarn 100g | Amber
fields.description: The superb Signature 4ply is made using a blend of wool that includes 35% Bluefaced Leicester for a luxurious feel, with a twist of nylon for added strength. This makes it ideal for projects such as hard-wearing socks, or stylish shawls with fantastic drape and softness. This yarn comes in a wide choice of solid shades including vibrant tones, classic colours and natural hues to suit all styles and stitches, whether you’re knitting plain, cable, rib or lace.

fields.name: Creative Cotton Aran Yarn 50g | Tangerine
fields.description: Creative Cotton Aran by Rico Design is a luxury cotton yarn with delightful properties. The special finishing process gives it a fine, smooth, and polished appearance. This cotton yarn looks elegant, feels great to the touch, and is less prone to pilling (forming wool balls). Creative Cotton Aran is perfect for home accessories, teddy bears, crocheted amigurumi animals, and all your knitting and crochet projects. With a wide range of colours available, there’s something to suit every project.

fields.name: Scheepjes Chunky Monkey Aran Yarn 100g | Air Force Blue
fields.description: Scheepjes Chunky Monkey is a wonderfully soft acrylic Aran yarn that is available in over 90 different shades! A big and bold yarn with a striking and varied colour pallette, it’s a great addition to any knitters stash. Despite its incrediby soft handle this yarn is fully machine washable at 40 degrees and can even be tumble dried on a low heat.

fields.name: Crochet Society Cuddly Craft DK Chenille Yarn 100g | Bubblegum
fields.description: Let go and have fun with the Crochet Society Cuddly Craft DK chenille yarn! From soft pastels to bright and bold hues and super-soft texture you can bring any creation to life. Each 100g ball has a gorgeous plush feel and is made from 100% Polyester, giving a smooth feel on your crochet hook and having super-easy care requirements. Whether you are creating adorable toys or soft and cosy blankets this is the yarn you need to add to your stash!

fields.name: Clover Amour Crochet Hook | 3mm
fields.description: Clover Amour crochet hooks are the ideal tool for crocheters of all abilities, from experienced hooker to beginner stitcher. The hooks are shaped for ease of use and to help with consistent tension. Each handle is also colour coded, with each size having a unique look to make them easy to identify. The smooth, easy-grip handles fit perfectly in your hand, offering an ergonomic crochet experience. Clover's larger hook sizes make crocheting with thicker yarns a breeze, while the smaller hooks are ideal for DK yarn and even micro crochet.

fields.name: Knit Pro Aluminium Crochet Hook | 3.5mm
fields.description: The KnitPro Waves Aluminium Crochet Hook is a practical tool designed for comfortable crocheting, with a colourful soft grip handle. With a length of 15cm and a hook size ranging from 2- 12mm, this crochet hook is suitable for various yarn types, making it a great addition to your crocheting supplies. Use the smaller crochet hooks for delicate lace items and doilies, or the larger hooks for amigurumi toys and homeware such as crochet blankets.

fields.name: Knit Pro Aluminium Crochet Hook | 5.5mm
fields.description: The KnitPro Waves Aluminium Crochet Hook is a practical tool designed for comfortable crocheting, with a colourful soft grip handle. fields.name: Knit Pro Symfonie Afghan/Tunisian Interchangeable Crochet Hook | Set of 8
fields.description: KnitPro Symfonie's beautiful, multi-coloured Tunisian crochet hooks are hand-crafted by skilled artisans who know and understand the art of tunisian and afghan crochet. These crochet hooks have been cleverly designed with grooves to prevent stitch slippage and their polished wood surface ensures effortless glide with every type of yarn. Easy to connect KnitPro cable with smooth join means easy stitch flow - no snagging, and you can use the cables from your KnitPro interchangeable needles too! Warm to the touch and gentle on the hand, they're both lightweight and exceptionally durable... just don't get distracted by how pretty they are! Contents: Set of 8 interchangeable hooks in the most popular sizes - 3.5mm, 4mm, 4.5mm, 5mm, 5.5mm, 6mm, 7mm & 8mm. Presented in a clear vinyl case with 4 cables (to make 60cm, 80cm (x2) and 100cm).

fields.name: Pony Aluminium Crochet Hook | 6mm
fields.description: Manufactured from solid aluminium, which is anodized to increase hardness and resist corrosion. This classic light grey range is the ideal solution for most knitting projects at an attractive price. Pony Aluminium Crochet Hooks are designed for smooth, comfortable crocheting. Lightweight and durable, these hooks glide effortlessly through yarn, making them ideal for both beginners and experienced crocheters. Available in a range of sizes, they’re perfect for projects of all types, from garments to accessories and home décor.

fields.name: Sirdar Soft Aluminum Crochet Hook | 2mm
fields.description: Designed to make crocheting easy, Sirdar’s smooth, lightweight aluminium hooks have ergonomic soft red handles for a comfortable grip, ideal for beginners and experienced makers alike. Their sturdy aluminium construction ensures long-lasting performance, while their soft finish provides an easy grip for precision work.

fields.name: Crochet Society Stitch Markers | Pack of 150
fields.description: There is a strong possibility that you and the rest of our crochet community have several projects on the go at once - and this means stitch markers are needed, and lots of them. What better to overcome this that to have a bumper pack of 150 stitch markers in an organised storage case as a solution! Featuring 10 colours of interlocking stitch markers, you will have plenty to spread around your projects. You could even colour co-ordinate the stitch marker with the colour of crochet hook you are using just in case your hook goes walkabout. When the case is empty, you can use this to store essential trinkets and small tools, or refill and reuse with more stitch markers.

fields.name: Crochet Society Wooden Yarn Bowl | Pink
fields.description: Yarn keeps getting getting tangled? Knots in your skeins driving you mad? Not to fear - our wooden yarn bowl is here! Featuring a stylish pop of colour, and a varnished wooden coating, our yarn bowl will tame unruly yarn whilst adding a designer-look to any room or coffee table.

fields.name: Crochet Society Yarn Swatch Sample Cards | Pack of 20
fields.description: This Yarn Swatch Sample Card set from Crochet Society is an essential tool for crochet projects with multiple colours of yarn. Arrange and label your yarn by colour, project or type to never forget which shades you are using. You could also use these wraps to organise scraps, and label them with brand, weight and care requirements to never get mixed up again.

fields.name: Bella Coco Crochet Magnetic Watch Set | Mint Green
fields.description: The Bella Coco Crochet Magnetic Watch Set is the perfect product for crocheting on the go. This magnetic watch has been designed to keep your stitch markers all in one place making it easier for you to crochet anywhere you please. The watch comes in Bella Coco's signature mint green colour and has a stylish slap-bracelet making it is easy for you to keep it secure and well fastened to your wrist. The bracelet is also detachable from the magnet and can be used as a ruler. This clever and compact design has been designed with crocheters in mind - to help you keep your pins and stitch markers in sight at all times. The watch also comes with 80 metal stitch markers and a handy storage holder. This is a must have set that will come in handy for crocheting on the go - or keeping things organised while you crochet at home!
